"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.container1","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container1","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.layoutGrid2","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid2 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.layoutGrid2$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.layoutGrid2$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.staticImage2","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage2","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$wallet.png?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}}]}},{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.layoutGrid2$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col align-self-center","content":[{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.text2","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text2","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Make a statement"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h6"}},{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.text3","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text3","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Fragrances and Fashion Accessories Division"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}},{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.text4","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text4","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Titan Belts and Wallets"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h4"}},{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.text5","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text5","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Titan Belts and Wallets are for men who want to be classy and stay current with the latest fashion trends. Titan’s extensive collection of wallets and belts in a variety of colours and styles emulates the needs and tastes of every customer. The wallets are crafted with a balance of class and functionality, and their signature collection of belts is designed with expertly chosen Italian leather."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.text6","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text6","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Bags by Fastrack"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h4"}},{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.text7","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text7","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Fastrack extended its footprint into accessories to help women accentuate their style. Bags by Fastrack offer chic and sophisticated styles from pretty and functional micro slings to fashionable and practical backpacks for trendsetting hustlers."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.text9","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text9","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"IRTH"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h4"}},{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.text8","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text8","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Titan ventures into the handbag segment with IRTH, that aims to highlight how it pays keen attention to functionality while also keeping it stylish. IRTH embodies the sense of marvel and emotion inherent in the brand and the care and attention with which every bag is designed. IRTH promises class and versatility with its handbags ranging from chic workbags to stylish totes."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.text11","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text11","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"SKINN"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h4"}},{"$widgetId":"40.S.Fashion.text10","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text10","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Designed in-house and created by six world-renowned Master Perfumers, SKINN Titan redefines the Indian fragrance industry with its product offering. Its range is specially crafted by blending exotic yet contemporary notes that are native to the rarest and finest of the ingredients sourced from myriad locations across the world. The current portfolio of SKINN includes 6 exciting variants in the EDP (Eau De Parfum) format and are crafted to last longer with notes that endure and grow pronounced with time."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}}]}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}}],"listenTargets":[]
